cause.description:
The oBoJ Foundation raises money for worthy causes via local music and BBQ events. Our flagship event is in it's third year and this year we raised over $4,000 for Prostate Cancer.
1. The suffering of others can be eased with little effort.
2. Saving the world can be fun.
cause.mission: save the world, one plate of BBQ at a time.
cause.name: The oBoJ Foundation
